text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 22 in F major, Op. 54, is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written in 1804 and is not played as often as the Waldstein sonata. Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM. ==Form== The sonata is in two sections, called movements: ==References== Piano Sonata 022 Category:Compositions in F major
title: Piano Sonata No. 22 (Beethoven)
